name: osint-toolkit
description: Comprehensive OSINT toolkit with intelligence tools made easy

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:sherlock"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd sherlock && python3 sherlock_api.py"
scripts._comment: ðŸ’¡ For easiest startup, use ./start.sh (Linux/macOS) or start.bat (Windows) instead of npm commands
